name: SwordBall (itch) (BlackJuice)
description:
Knight that fights with monsters by throwing ball at them.

Game also has 1v1 football mode

Controles fo 1v1 

Red:A(left) , D(right) , space(jump) , q(diagonal shoot), E(vertical shot) 

Green: left arrow, right arrow, arrow up (jump), 

l(lob shit), m(vertical shot)
